items.question: How do I create an account?
items.answer: Go to our sign-up page, enter your email and basic info, then verify your email to complete registration.

items.question: How can I get an invoice?
items.answer: Sign in → Billing Center → choose the month → click "Download Invoice". For a paper invoice, contact Finance Support.

items.question: What is the support response time?
items.answer: Standard: Mon–Fri 9:00–18:00, first response within 2 hours. For critical incidents, mark the ticket as "Urgent" and also call us.

items.question: How do you keep data secure?
items.answer: We use encryption in transit and at rest, least-privilege access, dual backups, and audit trails. See the Security Whitepaper. For sensitive data, sign a Data Processing Addendum (DPA) with us.
